title: Front-end Development
description: If you would like to get started as a front-end web developer, you are going to LOVE this road-map! Work on amazing projects ranging from a simple HTML page to a complete JavaScript based Google Chrome extension.

title: Back-end development
description: This road-map will tell you about server, an application, and a database. Will give you a detailed view of what happens at the server side of a website, Databases and fetching API's.

title: App development
description: . Whether you are a complete beginner or are coming from another language or platform, this road-map will go from setting up and installing Android Studio to building real apps that are useful and look great.

title: Competitive programming
description: No less than a mental sport. One that asks to Learn about the creative approach to tech world and efficient use of coding tools.

title: Cyber Security
description: This road-map covers the fundamental building blocks of your required skill set - You will understand the threat and vulnerability landscape through threat modeling and risk assessments.

title: Cloud computing
description: Get your hands dirty using these concepts of cloud. Evolution leading to Revolution – traditional IT already uses a variety of virtualization technologies to better utilize their physical IT resources.

title: AI/ML
description: If you have no experience in ML development, it’s okay: this road-map includes both introductory and advanced level materials.

title: Blockchain
description: Learn key Blockchain concepts, intuition and practical training to get you quickly up to speed with all things Crypto and Blockchain related.

title: AR/VR
description: “When we get to this [AR] world, a lot of the things we think about today as physical objects, like a TV, will be $1 apps in an AR app store” — Mark Zukerberg

title: Internet of Things (IoT)
description: “As the Internet of things advances, the very notion of a clear dividing line between reality and virtual reality becomes blurred, sometimes in creative ways.”

title: DevOps
description: “Currently, DevOps is more like a philosophical movement, not yet a precise collection of practices, descriptive or prescriptive.”

title: Data Science
description: Data science is a new programming paradigm, a new way of communicating our wishes to a computer. It allows you to automate the ineffable.
